description: This file defines a JavaScript module for interacting with a backend API of the Stock Growth Analyzer frontend. It includes functions to resolve the backend URL, build request URLs, normalize API response data, handle responses including error handling, and specific functions to initiate analysis requests and retrieve the API base URL. The functions and constants suggest this is a client-side API wrapper used for making HTTP requests to analyze stock growth data.

methods.name: resolveBaseUrl()
methods.description: Determines the backend API base URL by checking environment variable, current window location, or defaulting to localhost.

methods.name: buildUrl(path)
methods.description: Concatenates a path to the base URL to generate a full API endpoint URL.

methods.name: normalizeRow(row)
methods.description: Normalizes a data row object for consistent key naming used in UI.

methods.name: handleResponse(res)
methods.description: Processes the fetch response, parses JSON or text, handles errors, and formats data into a consistent shape.

methods.name: analyzeGrowth(payload)
methods.description: Sends a POST request to analyze stock growth with specified parameters, returning normalized results and warnings.

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl()
methods.description: Returns the resolved API base URL for display or debugging.
